format:
<button id="btn-new-topic" class="md-raised md-primary">New topic‚Ä¶</button>
<script>
(function(scope){
 function bind(){
 var btn = document.getElementById('btn-new-topic');
 if (!btn || btn._bound) return;
 btn._bound = true;
 btn.addEventListener('click', function(){
 var t = window.prompt('Enter new topic','');
 if (t && t.trim()) {
 scope.send({payload: t.trim(), topic:'new-topic'});
 }
 });
 }
 bind();
 scope.$watch('msg', function(){ setTimeout(bind, 0); });
})(scope);
</script>
